detail_desc: Cardigan in a soft textured knit with a V-neck, loop fasteners with pearly plastic beads down the front and overlocked edges at the cuffs and hem.
Shorts in soft sweatshirt fabric with a print motif. Wide, covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist, pockets in the side seams, a back pocket and raw-edge hems.
Jumper in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with dropped shoulders, long, embroidered sleeves, and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Slim-fit trousers in soft, superstretch twill for maximum mobility. Adjustable elasticated waist (in sizes 8-12Y), a zip fly and button, fake front pockets, real back pockets and straight hems.
Headband in a soft knit with a knot at the front.
Blouse in an airy, patterned viscose weave with a V-neck, buttons down the front and 3/4-length sleeves with narrow elastication and a flounce at the cuffs.

Chinos in stretch cotton twill with a zip fly and button, diagonal side pockets and welt back pockets with a button. Skinny Fit – a fit with slightly shorter legs that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a completely fitted silhouette.
Sleeveless bodysuits in soft organic cotton jersey with press-studs at the crotch.

Dress in washed, stretch, flexible cotton denim for maximum mobility with embroidery on the front and straps that cross and fasten with a concealed press-stud at the back. Elastication at the back of the waist.
Court shoes with pointed toes and covered heels. Satin linings and imitation leather insoles. Heel 6 cm.
Cropped halterneck top in soft, ribbed viscose jersey with a V-neck.

Calf-length lace dress with a V-neck, sewn-in wrapover at the front, open section at the back and concealed button at the back of the neck. Short cap sleeves, a seam at the waist, concealed zip in the side and a softly draping, gently flared skirt. Partly lined in jersey.
5-pocket slim-fit shorts in washed, superstretch, flexible denim for maximum mobility with an adjustable elasticated waist and zip fly and button.
Soft, non-wired lace bra with lined cups that give the bust a natural shape and light support. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, a metal fastener at the front and an elasticated, lace-trimmed hem.
Knee-length dress in satin with a collar, buttons at the top, a narrow elasticated seam at the waist and short, butterfly sleeves. Unlined.
Hat in a soft, fine knit with a ribbed hem and an appliqué on the front.
Leggings in sturdy cotton jersey with an elasticated waist and soft brushed inside.

Shirt with a turn-down collar, French front and long sleeves with narrow cuffs and adjustable buttoning. Yoke and darts at the back and a rounded hem. Slim fit with narrow shoulders and a tapered waist for a fitted silhouette.
A pair of hoop earrings in textured, twisted metal.
Short, fitted, off-the-shoulder top in ribbed jersey with a decorative knot detail at the front and long sleeves.
Warm-lined boots in imitation leather with lacing at the front, a zip in one side and a loop at the back. Pile linings and insoles.
Long-sleeved top in soft, printed cotton jersey with ribbing around the neckline and cuffs and short slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.

Single-breasted jacket in a textured weave with notch lapels and buttoning at the front. Fake pocket with a decorative handkerchief at the top and fake flap pockets at the front. Decorative buttons at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined.
NICK VEASEY x H&M. T-shirt in printed cotton jersey.
Blouse in airy chiffon with a pleated collar, V-neck opening at the front with ties at the top, and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Lined.
Fine-knit socks in a soft cotton blend.
Short, A-line dress in a cotton weave with wide shoulder straps, open, short sleeves with ties, and a rounded hem.
Short-sleeved dress in slub cotton jersey with a yoke in woven fabric with broderie anglaise.
T-shirt in soft jersey with a slightly wider, raw-edge neckline, seam centre back and short, raw-edged sleeves. Slightly longer and rounded at the back.
Jumper in soft, fine-knit merino wool with a round neck, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Flip-flops with imitation suede straps decorated with rhinestones.
5-pocket jeans in washed denim with a regular waist, button fly and straight legs.
Fully lined bikini top with underwired, moulded, padded cups that lift and shape. Ties at the back of the neck and back.
Pyjamas in soft, ribbed cotton jersey. Top with decorative buttons at the top and long sleeves. Bottoms with covered elastication at the waist and ribbed hems.
Treggings in sturdy jersey with an elasticated waist, fake fly, fake front pockets and real back pockets.

Sleeveless dress in tulle with narrow shoulder straps, a sequined bodice and a zip at the back. Gathered seam at the waist and a super-flared skirt in two layers of tulle, the top layer with sequined butterfly appliqués. Lined.
Straight-cut T-shirt in jersey made from a cotton blend with cap sleeves and a rounded hem.
Baby Exclusive. Dungaree dress in a patterned organic cotton weave with an elasticated waist and adjustable straps that cross and fasten at the back. Lined.
Sports top in fast-drying functional fabric with a mesh racer back and elasticated hem. Lined at the front.
Leggings in sturdy jersey with an elasticated waist.
Pyjamas in soft cotton jersey. Long-sleeved top with a print motif on the front and ribbed cuffs. Bottoms with an elasticated waist and ribbed hems.
Shorts in sweatshirt fabric with wide elastication at the waist and side pockets.

Jacket in woven fabric with a detachable, jersey-lined hood, stand-up collar and zip down the front. Diagonal front pockets, elastication at the cuffs and hem, and reflective details. Partly lined in fleece.
Long-sleeved top in soft organic cotton jersey.
V-neck jumper in a soft, fine knit with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.

Rigid clutch bag in a jute and cotton blend with a gold-coloured metal frame, raffia motif on the front and smooth back. Metal chain shoulder strap and a clasp fastening. Fabric lining. Size approx. 5x10x16 cm.
Sock-style court shoes in imitation leather with a jersey top section and pointed toes. Satin linings, imitation leather insoles and rubber soles. Heel 8 cm.
Top in soft linen and viscose jersey with short cap sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups.
Aviator-style sunglasses with slim frames and sidepieces in metal and plastic. Adjustable nose pads and tinted, UV-protective lenses.
Lace Brazilian briefs with a low waist, lined gusset, wide sides and half-string back.
T-shirt in soft, printed cotton jersey with a ribbed neckline.
Long-sleeved tops in ribbed organic cotton jersey.
Short-sleeved bolero in loose-knit cotton with a button at the top and ribbing around the neckline. Short sleeves with scalloped edges and a scalloped edge around the opening.
All-in-one pyjamas in soft cotton jersey with a zip down the front and along one leg, long sleeves and full feet.
Cotton jersey tops with a narrow shoulder straps, a racer back and elasticated hem.

Short, A-line dress in a crinkled viscose weave with a round neckline, small opening with ties at the front and long sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs. Gathered seams at the hem and on the sleeves for added width and soft draping. Unlined.
Baby Exclusive. Top in soft organic cotton jersey with narrow shoulder straps and an embroidered detail at the top.
Short top in jacquard-patterned jersey in a narrow cut at the top with short, narrow shoulder straps.
Faux fur jacket with a collar, concealed hook-and-eye fasteners at the front and pockets in the side seams. Lined.

CONSCIOUS EXCLUSIVE. Short dress in a Tencel™ lyocell and silk blend containing glittery threads with a V-neck and narrow shoulder straps. Narrow ties and a rounded, gathered seam at the back, and a concealed zip in one side. Asymmetric seam with a small frill under the bust and a softly draping skirt with a wide flounce at the hem. Recycled polyester lining.
Sunglasses with metal frames and UV-protective, tinted lenses.
Polo shirt in cotton piqué with a ribbed collar, two buttons at the top, short sleeves with ribbed trims, and short slits in the sides.
Top in pima cotton jersey with gathers at the front of the neckline, 3/4-length sleeves and gathered side seams for best fit.

Fitted lace body with a V-neck and wide, flounced trim at the front that continues over the shoulders. Seam at the hips, below which is a jersey section with press-studs at the crotch. Lined at the front.

Short dress in a viscose weave with a small stand-up collar and V-neck opening at the top. Dropped shoulders, short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Unlined.
Sports tops in fast-drying functional fabric with short raglan sleeves.
Long, rib-knit jumper in a soft cotton-blend with long raglan sleeves, ribbed cuffs, and slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Pleated jersey top with a metallic coating, narrow shoulder straps and a V-neck at the front.
Vest top in a soft, ribbed cotton and viscose blend with a lace trim around the neckline and armholes.
Oversized jumper in a soft knit with a deep V-neck, long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Padded gilet in windproof, water-repellent functional fabric with a concealed stand up collar and hood with an elastic drawstring. Taped zip down the front with a chin guard, zipped, fleece-lined side pockets and a concealed elastic drawstring at the hem. Lined.

Short-sleeved shirt in an airy cotton weave with a tie or bow tie. Shirt with a collar, classic front, yoke with a pleat at the back and rounded hem. Pre-tied tie or bow tie with an elastic strap and adjustable plastic fastener.
Treggings in sturdy jersey with an elasticated waist, fake fly, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Imitation leather hi-tops with an adjustable hook and loop tab, elasticated lacing, and a loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles.
Jeans in washed stretch denim with skinny legs, real back pockets and wide jersey ribbing at the waist for optimum comfort.
Hipster briefs in lace with a low waist, lined gusset, wide sides and cutaway coverage at the back. The polyamide content of the briefs is partly recycled.
Fitted top in soft ribbed fabric with a V-neck, spaghetti shoulder straps that cross at the back and a straight-cut hem.
5-pocket jeans in washed stretch denim with a regular waist, zip fly and skinny legs.
T-shirt in soft jersey with a slightly wider, raw-edge neckline, seam centre back and short, raw-edged sleeves. Slightly longer and rounded at the back.
Jacket in washed denim with worn details, a collar and buttons down the front and at the cuffs. Flap chest pockets with a button, side pockets and an adjustable tab and buttons at the back.
